export var substring_sessionStorage='kniffel_sessionStorage_';export var sessionStorage_session=substring_sessionStorage+substring_session;export var sessionStorage_players=substring_sessionStorage+substring_players;export var sessionStorage_columns=substring_sessionStorage+substring_columns;export var sessionStorage_finalscores=substring_sessionStorage+substring_finalscores;export var sessionStorage_lastPlayer=substring_sessionStorage+substring_lastPlayer;export var sessionStorage_inputType=substring_sessionStorage+substring_inputType;export var sessionStorage_gnadenwurf=substring_sessionStorage+substring_gnadenwurf;export var sessionStorage_winner=substring_sessionStorage+substring_winner;export var sessionStorage_start=substring_sessionStorage+substring_start;//____________________ClearStorage____________________
export function clearSessionStorage(){cSS(substring_sessionStorage);}function cSS(substring){var sessionStorage_Keys=[];for(var i=0;i<sessionStorage.length;i++){sessionStorage_Keys.push(sessionStorage.key(i));}for(var _i=0,_sessionStorage_Keys=sessionStorage_Keys;_i<_sessionStorage_Keys.length;_i++){var key=_sessionStorage_Keys[_i];if(key.includes(substring)){sessionStorage.removeItem(key);}}}//____________________CreateObjects____________________
export var createPlayer=function createPlayer(name,alias,color){return{Name:name,Alias:alias,Color:color,Wins:0};};export var createSession=function createSession(sessionName,columns,list_playerOrder,list_players){return{SessionName:sessionName,Columns:columns,InputType:3,LastPlayed:new Date(),CreatedDate:new Date(),List_PlayerOrder:list_playerOrder,List_Players:list_players};};export var createFinalScoreElement=function createFinalScoreElement(start,columns,surrender,list_winner,playerScores){var finalScore={Start:start,End:new Date(),Columns:columns,Surrender:surrender,List_Winner:list_winner,PlayerScores:playerScores};return finalScore;};export var formatDate=function formatDate(date){var d=new Date(date);var day=d.getDate();var month=d.getMonth()+1;var year=d.getFullYear();var formattedDay=day<10?"0".concat(day):"".concat(day);var formattedMonth=month<10?"0".concat(month):"".concat(month);return"".concat(formattedDay,".").concat(formattedMonth,".").concat(year);};
